text: This is a fabulous opportunity that Professor Collazo has shared! Just note that you have three electives at most, and this will take the place of one of them. Also,  note that you register for the academic internship like any other three hour course, with the accompanying tuition per hour. (Students are sometimes surprised by the latter fact until they see their tuition bill).
